      • listRoot

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response listRoot()
        is the entryPoint of the application. It lists all files in the root directory in HTML format
        Returns:
        an http response 200 and a formatted HTML which represents the files in the root if everything goes fine an http response 502 if the connexion to the ftp server failed an http response 404 if the directory can't be found

      • listDirectory

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response listDirectory(java.lang.String dirname)
        lists all files in the directory specified by dirname in HTML format
        Parameters:
        dirname - the name of the directory to be listed
        Returns:
        an http response 200 and a formatted HTML which represents the files in the directory dirname if everithing goes fine an http response 502 if the connexion to the ftp server failed an http response 404 if the directory can't be found

        let the user to retrieve the file specified by dirname/filename
        Parameters:
        dirname - the name of directory whre the file is
        filename - the name of the file to be retrieved
        Returns:
        an http response 200 and the stream of the requested file everything goes well an http response 502 if the connexion to the ftp server failed
